name: Robert Isaac Monroy
coverLetter: Yes I Haile Selassie I JAH Rastafari. I take the vow of the Nazirite and am happy to live off JAH sacred herb plantation. I love shoveling, watering plants, growing, burning. Been living for ganja since 2012, just off a year full time at dwarf coconut/cannabis farm on big island. Get paid in cash and nuggets ideal. Getting a phone when possible, please email immediately so that I may report for duty. Have scissors, papers, lighter, ebt card, applying for ssi, ultra lightweight, just need a big ganja farm to work on, happy to be here. Bless.
